name: Borderlands 2: Mad Moxxi and the Wedding Day Massacre
name_original: Borderlands 2: Mad Moxxi and the Wedding Day Massacre
description:
Borderlands 2: Mad Moxxi and the Wedding Day Massacre is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by 2K Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Borderlands 2: Mad Moxxi and the Wedding Day Massacre is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
